title: Tesla to get €1.14Bn in state funding for Berlin battery plant
notes:
Location:
- The battery cell production project is planned to be located in Grünheide near Berlin, Germany.

Capacity:
- The planned capacity of the cell factory is set to be over 100 GWh in the longer term.

Investment amounts:
- The total investment volume for the project is estimated to be around five billion euros.
- The German Ministry of Economics and Technology (BMVi) may provide 1.135 billion euros in funding for the project.
- The ACC joint venture, involving PSA, Opel, and Saft, will receive 437 million euros in state funding for a battery cell plant in Kaiserslautern, with the companies investing around 2 billion euros in the factory.

Project progress:
- The project is in the process of receiving funding, with the grant notice planned for the 4th quarter of 2021.
- The amendments for the battery cell production facility are undergoing approval, and the project has faced difficulties in the public approval procedures.

Project type:
- The project involves the addition of a battery cell production facility to an existing Tesla plant in Grünheide.

Value chain stages:
- The facility will cover at least the cell fabrication stage, where cathode and anode are combined with an electrolyte.

title: Tesla plans to invest $8 billion into EV battery plant next to Giga Berlin
notes:
Location:
- The battery plant project is located at the site of Tesla's Gigafactory in Grünheide near Berlin, Germany.

Capacity:
- The planned capacity of the battery plant is 250GWh, making it one of the largest battery plants in the world.

Investment amounts:
- Tesla plans to invest around 5 billion euros in cell production for the battery plant.
- The German government is expected to decide on whether to invest 1 billion euros towards the project by the end of 2021.
- The project is ruled eligible for the European Union’s 2.9 billion euro European Battery Innovation project, with 1.135 billion euros in state funding for the development of the German battery production reportedly earmarked for Tesla.

Project progress:
- The German ministry of economic reportedly gave Tesla the green light to start making preparations in early 2021.
- The funding decision from the German government is planned for the fourth quarter of 2021.
